name: Space Volleyball
description:
Space Volleyball is a local-multiplayer volleyball in space.

The game requires two players to be played.

Player 1 (Red) Controls:

  • A/D - Move Left/Right
  • W - Jump

Player 2 (Blue) Controls:

  • Left/Right Arrow - Move Left/Right
  • Up Arrow - Jump

Press "Esc" key to return to the main menu.

Have Fun and Thanks for downloading! :)
